feed.title: BIP number request for wallet policies

entry.title: BIP number request for wallet policies
entry.summary: The recent communication highlights the assignment of a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) number to a particular pull request. The assigned BIP number is BIP 388, which marks an important milestone for the proposal within the development community. Michael Folkson was acknowledged for his contribution in this process. Those interested in further information or who wish to delve deeper into Bitcoin can refer to the resources provided by Michael, including a dedicated educational channel on YouTube. This channel, named "Port of Bitcoin," serves as a platform to learn about Bitcoin and can be accessed through [this link](https://www.youtube.com/@portofbitcoin). Michael also shared contact details for further communication and collaboration, including his email address and GPG key, emphasizing the importance of security and privacy in these interactions.
